sentences.en: A crowd of onlookers had gathered at the scene of the accident.
sentences.cn: 一群旁观者围聚在事故现场。

sentences.en: An impartial onlooker must be sought out.
An onlooker said:'The little girl was smiling and obviously wanted a cuddle for her picture.
sentences.cn: 一位旁观者说: “ 小女孩微笑着,显然想和她拍照拥抱啊. ”

sentences.en: By the time the ambulance arrived, a crowd of onlooker had gathered.
sentences.cn: 救护车赶到时, 围观的人已经很多了.

sentences.en: He became an onlooker and sat around , waiting with folded arms for victory to come.
His manner is that of an onlooker.
sentences.cn: 他采取一种旁观者的态度.

sentences.en: In the space of myths, only onlooker knows the secret within, enjoying in the individualistic zone.
sentences.cn: 迷思的空间内,充满著无限的想像空间, 其中的秘密只有个人了解其中道理, 个人享受其中.

sentences.en: Onlooker: I haven't got the patience.
sentences.cn: 旁观者: 我没那耐性.

sentences.en: So for the onlooker, the player merely repeats himself with each run of the level.
sentences.cn: 对于旁观者来说亦然, 玩家只是单调的重复着每一关.

sentences.en: The onlooker affirmed the fact to be true.
sentences.cn: 这位旁观者断言这是事实.

sentences.en: We cannot remain a passive onlooker to the hysteric moves of the enemies.
sentences.cn: 我们不能对敌人目中无人的行动坐视不理.

trans.tran_cn: 旁观者，目击者，观众（等于spectator）
trans.tran_en: someone who watches something happening without being involved in it
